data.title: Real Hot Pot!
data.text: The menu is a little confusing as it is often literally translated from Chinese to English. But it is worth it! If you want real Chinese hot pot this is the place to be! You can always tell when food from a certain culture is authentic and delicious due to the number of people there from that culture and this place is always packed with Asian customers! Enjoy!

data.title: Really? NOT dim sum.
data.text: Not an authentic dim sum place. The meat is the cheapest they could find. I am really tired of restaurants making food for the palates of Iowans just as this place does.
